column5: Ice wont be gone by opener, but Roloff wasted no time getting wet as soon as the gap at shore appeared. Nice to see the sun at last too. That aint going to last though, clouds, rain and minus temps at night again for much of this week. I am going to buy a few dozen minnows on Friday though, should be able to cast from shore.
What a great friend Roloff has become for your family Simon.
What's that saying"Happy Dog,Happy life?"lol.He sure looks at home Simon!
Roloff is "One lean, mean NWO fish playing machine".  Great dog!
